name: Umbrella_Report
author: Kyle Parrish
description: Query the Umbrella Reporting API for recent DNS queries and their status.

configurationItems.name: api_key
configurationItems.description: Api Key provided by Umbrella Admin Console.

configurationItems.name: api_secret
configurationItems.description: Api Secret provided by Umbrella Admin Console.

configurationItems.name: organization_id
configurationItems.description: Organization ID provided by Umbrella Admin Console.

configurationItems.name: query_limit
configurationItems.description: Maximum number of results to return.
